name: Journey of the Fireflies (Demo 0.0.5a)
description:
STORY:
You play as Yuki a small girl who wants to  free the  world from evil. Some mysterious evil got in the woods and bound all fireflies and effected the wildlife. You need to stop the evil from spreading and free all fireflies so they can help you clense the evil.

CONTEXT
This is my first game ever. I made it with GameMaker.
This is a DEMO  in the early alpha status. It contains 3 tutorial levels and 3 main levels.
If you find any bugs or have any advice for me, please be free and contact me, I am looking forward to improve this game as much as I can.

CREDITS
Credits go to Shaun Spalding and his Platformer tutorial and other tutorials, without him I would not started this project. https://shaunjs.itch.io/
